channel.title: INtech
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INtech, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: 33 Best STEM Toys for Kids (2024): Make Learning Fun
item.description: We found lots of math-filled and science-rich toys for tiny nerds to assemble, bake, squish—or even tear apart and rebuild.

item.title: Bluesky teases paid subscription, Bluesky+, in new mockup

item.title: OpenAI’s Sora is launching today — here are highlights from the first review

item.title: Best Gifts for Hikers, Backpackers, Outdoorsy People (2024)
item.description: Let them pick out their own hiking boots. Instead, try gifting a useful app or a nature journal to delight your outdoorsy friend.

item.title: Ukraine says Russian hackers are targeting country’s defense contractors

item.title: Bose's Wacky Open Earbuds Won Over My Reluctant Heart
item.description: With a great fit and class-leading sound, these pricey open-ear buds have me hooked.

item.title: 48 Hours in Tokyo With My AI Travel Companion
item.description: People use AI pals for all sorts of reasons. Here’s what happens when you take one on a solo trip to Japan.
